name: TerminalPoint - Sci-Fi Shooter
description:
Keep in mind that the demo is still in an early state.

w,s,a,d - movement

q,e - altitude

mouse - free-look

Everything may change as the game goes further into development.

Project Terminal Point is an solo-developed shooter combat flight action game in Sci-Fi setting. Game to be released on PC with an emphasis on fun and refined gameplay, true-to-its-roots inspirations, and an engaging single player experience. 

Perfect for those who aren't looking for a simulator experience with the ease of pick up and play. Skillfully control a combat drone completing special tasks to destroy enemies.

Full changelog will be posted on the Development Log below.

Any feedback can either go to :

Itch.io Comments Section

Email : philatovma@gmail.com

Show-Off: https://www.artstation.com/philatovma

Thank you for all your support!

I hope it meets your expectations.
